page.title: 15 PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: Kirk Ireton has two pubs. One, called The{Barley Mow}is 400 years old. Part of the T.V. programme "The Nanny" was filmed there. The{Bull's Head}is the other public house, but it might close down and a housing estate be built there instead. In the{Bull's Head}people play darts, dominoes and pool. They win trophies. Many villagers do not want to lose the{Bull's Head}even if they think it is a good idea to build some cheaper houses. One local resident told us, { "What this village needs is a proper {local pub i.e. one that is welcoming {to all sections of village society, is {prepared to house local pub teams, is {clean and well cared for and looks {after its beer properly! Neither {existing pub fulfils all these {criteria." }
